Administration Manager Job at LEAM Consulting




        
    

        
        LEAM Consulting is the foremost consulting firm which stands out in areas of professional certification training, HR advisory services, Business Development/Startup and IT consulting services in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administration Manager

Job Location: Asaba, Delta
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Brief


	The ideal candidate must have a strong background in security management, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work collaboratively with other departments


Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Oversee and support the security team, assign security officers to specific patrol areas & Beat, ensure duties are performed effectively and address any issues providing training and disciplinary action where necessary
	Monitor team and individual performance, provide feedback, and hold regular team briefings.
	Manage day-to-day security operations and become familiar with the site layout or beat allocation to create and implement effective policies and procedures.
	Oversee day to day activities of each department in the office,Incident Management and Emergency
	Respond to and investigate any security breaches or incidents, escort unauthorized personnel from the site, conduct emergency drills, and assist with evacuation in an emergency, liaising with the emergency services where necessary.


Requirements


	HND/B.Sc in any relevant field of study
	2-3 years of experience in a security role, with supervisory experience preferred.
	Strong knowledge of security protocols and emergency response procedures.
	Excellent leadership and team management skills.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills for interaction with staff and stakeholders.


Salary
N100,000 - N120,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@leamconsulting.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: For more Whatsapp: 09047710414.
